Name: Aviator #2
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Bittersweet herbal notes of vermouth with a subtle hint of gin.
History: A classic cocktail of unknown origin.
Nutrition: One serving of Aviator #2 contains 170 calories
